price: 103 Mais la plupart des hommes, quels que soient les efforts que tu déploieras, rejetteront la foi.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
